introduction: Also Known AsNudes on the Rocks (USA) (alternate title)TaglinesThe First Women on Earth Were His PlaymatesMain DetailsReleased in 1963ColorRuntime: 75 minAspect Ratio: (1.37 : 1)Rated:Production Co.: BiolaneDistribution Co.: American Film Distributing Corporation (AFDC) (USA) (theatrical) | Sam Lake Enterprises (USA) (theatrical) | Waldorf Pictures (USA) (theatrical)Cast and CrewDirected by William Rose (as Werner Rose), Arnold DrakeWritten by Arnold Drake, Herbert Lannard, and William Rose (as Werner Rose)Starring: Charlie Robinson, Irving Selig, Al Monaco, Dino Tarronova, Toni Monaco, Carl Shelton, Bebe Lent, Morton Taylor, Mila Milo, Sherry Parker, Eddie Carmel, Gigi Darlene, Audrey Campbell, Herbert Lannard, and Jackie MillerProduced by Herbert LannardOriginal Music by Martin RomanCinematography by William Rose (as Werner Rose)Film Editing by (uncredited)
